TEXT.TITLE: <MARSAM PHARMACEUTICALS INC> IN INITIAL OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Marsam Pharmaceuticals Inc said an initial public offering of 800,000 common shares is underway at 15 dlrs per share through sole underwriter <Smith Barney, Harris Upham and Co>. Reuter
